pr_title: [DOCS] Add info about why we removed test fw docs

timeline.message: [DOCS] Add info about why we removed test fw docs

timeline.bodyText:
We should make similar changes in the other redirects.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            (https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/issues/55257[55257]) from the {es} Reference 
          
          
            
            ({es-issue}55257[#55257]) from the {es} Reference
timeline.author: jrodewig
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -637,32 +637,67 @@ See:
 [role="exclude",id="testing"]
 === Testing
 
-This page was deleted.
+This page was deleted. 
+Information about the Java testing framework was removed 
+(https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/issues/55257[55257]) from the {es} Reference

timeline.bodyText:
Should we refer to this as an open doc issue? This implies we'd need to update these redirects if the issue status changes. Also don't know if we need to call it a doc issue.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            There is an open doc issue (https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/issues/55258[#55258]) 
          
          
            
            There is an issue ({es-issue}55258[#55258])
timeline.author: jrodewig
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -637,32 +637,67 @@ See:
 [role="exclude",id="testing"]
 === Testing
 
-This page was deleted.
+This page was deleted. 
+Information about the Java testing framework was removed 
+(https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/issues/55257[55257]) from the {es} Reference 
+because it was out of date and erroneously implied that it should be used by application developers.  
+There is an open doc issue (https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/issues/55258[#55258])

timeline.message:
Apply suggestions from code review

Co-authored-by: James Rodewig <40268737+jrodewig@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            (https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/issues/55257[55257]) from the {es} Reference 
          
          
            
            ({es-issue}55257[55257]) from the {es} Reference
timeline.author: debadair
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -637,32 +637,67 @@ See:
 [role="exclude",id="testing"]
 === Testing
 
-This page was deleted.
+This page was deleted. 
+Information about the Java testing framework was removed 
+({es-issue}55257[#55257]) from the {es} Reference 
+because it was out of date and erroneously implied that it should be used by application developers.  
+There is an issue ({es-issue}55258[#55258]) 
+for providing general testing guidance for applications that communicate with {es}. 
 
 [role="exclude",id="testing-framework"]
 === Java testing framework
 
 This page was deleted.
+Information about the Java testing framework was removed 
+(https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/issues/55257[55257]) from the {es} Reference

            for providing general testing guidance for applications that communicate with {es}. 
          
          
            
            There is an issue ({es-issue}[#55258]) 
          
          
            
            for providing general testing guidance for applications that communicate with {es}.
